column4: I have a question about security: I have apache on my computer and lately I see connection attempts to it from 127.0.0.1 which try to connect to different servers http://paste.ubuntu.com/571919/ . What could that be caused by?
that is your own host, ignore it
but yeah, still, I hope it's not some bad software of something. I didn't use to have that before like 3 days ago
